name: Ease3
short_description:
We feel TYPO3 4.5 LTS  has a lot of parts to be enhanced, and yet a lot of new features could be added to existing infrastructure in order to improve further the enterprise mission of this CMS.
So, given the fact TYPO3 foundation declared there will be no functionality enhancements on TYPO3 4.5 LTS, we have decided to start a new CMS, derived from that code: Ease3.
Ease3 wants to be a professional CMS, for professional developers, with these main goals:
- improve security
- ease life of professional developers
- attract companies developing professional solutions, making easier development, selling and support of solutions based on Ease3
- make more easy integration of code with other CMS/platforms
- make Ease3 stable and fairly indipendent from PHP versions
summary: Professional CMS based on TYPO3 version 4.5 LTS
